ygData.subject: Re: Bard songs canceling spell effects, bug or feature?
ygData.msgSnippet: Spoiler... . . . . . . . . . . . . . . the mask of the deciever comes from the froglok assassin in the tower in lower guk.  the assassin also drops the
ygData.messageBody:
Spoiler...
.

.
.

.

.
.
the mask of the deciever comes from the froglok assassin in the tower in
lower guk. the assassin also drops the cerrated bone dirk i believe.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Adam DeMarino [mailto:psycotix@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 7:18 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard songs canceling spell effects, bug or
> feature?
>
>
> From: Adam DeMarino <psycotix@...>
>
> I've been wondering where do you get that mask anyway? I've sen thazul
> and zerk running around cazic-thule as dark elves on solusek ro, that
> I've come to want my own hehe. Unfortunately they won't tell me where
> they got it, and zerk'll pay for doing this, and taunt me. :(
>
> Talonus DuPrey
> Traveling Bard of Solusek Ro
>
> "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
> >
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > you don't have to camp. just like in the past when a
> procing weapon made
> > our songs stick, you can click on and off a song as fast as
> you can like 15
> > or so times to unstick it, it works eventually.
> >
> > luckily i look so much better as a wood elf than dark elf i
> don't use my
> > mask too much unless to show i'm in an evil bad mood =P
> >
> > Shada Silverleaf, Level 48 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> > Erisi, Level 6 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
> >
> > > The
> > > whole spell stacking/canceling issue seems to still be
> > > fubard, for instance
> > > i cant use the mask of the deciever to turn into a dark elf
> > > while a song is
> > > playing. And if a song happens to be playing while the mask
> > > effect wears
> > > off my songs lock up and i cant change or stop or start a
> > > song unless i
> > > camp out.
> > >
